mapper.sql: cloud_id, sg_id, name, phase_status, description, user_id, sg_id_from_agent, create_time, update_time, ee_bp, ee_user, ee_status, is_default, ee_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tbl_cmp_security_group
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cmp_security_group (cloud_id, sg_id, name, phase_status, description, user_id, sg_id_from_agent, create_time, update_time, ee_bp, ee_user, ee_status, is_default, ee_id) values (#{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sgIdFromAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, #{eeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update tbl_cmp_security_group set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phase_status = #{phaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sg_id_from_agent = #{sgIdFromAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ee_bp = #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ee_user = #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ee_status = #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, ee_id = #{eeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sg_id = #{sgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT sub1.sg_id, sub1.name, sub1.rule_count, sub2.compute_instance_count, sub1.phase_status, sub1.description, sub1.create_time, sub1.update_time, sub1.ee_bp, sub1.ee_user, sub1.ee_status, sub1.is_default from (SELECT sg.sg_id, sg.name, sg.phase_status, sg.description, COALESCE(sub.rule_count, 0) as rule_count, sg.ee_bp, sg.ee_user, sg.ee_status, sg.is_default, sg.create_time, sg.update_time FROM tbl_cmp_security_group AS sg LEFT JOIN (SELECT sg.sg_id, COUNT(DISTINCT RULE.rule_id) AS rule_count FROM tbl_cmp_security_group as sg LEFT JOIN tbl_cmp_security_group_rule AS RULE on sg.sg_id = RULE.sg_id where
GROUP BY sg.sg_id ) sub on sg.sg_id = sub.sg_id
AND sg.cloud_id = #{cloudId} AND sg.ee_status != - 1
and sg.ee_user=#{userId}
and sg.name like '%' || #{name} || '%' ) sub1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT sg.sg_id, COALESCE(sub.compute_instance_count, 0)as compute_instance_count FROM tbl_cmp_security_group AS sg LEFT JOIN (SELECT sg.sg_id, COUNT (DISTINCT compute_ins.instance_id ) AS compute_instance_count FROM tbl_cmp_security_group as sg LEFT JOIN tbl_cmp_sg_vm_instance AS compute_ins ON sg.sg_id = compute_ins.sg_id where
GROUP BY sg.sg_id ) sub on sg.sg_id = sub.sg_id ) sub2 on sub1.sg_id = sub2.sg_id order by sub1.create_time desc
limit #{pageSize} offset #{startRow}
select sg_id from tbl_cmp_security_group where cloud_id = #{cloudId} and ee_status = 0
mapper.update:
update tbl_cmp_security_group
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phase_status = #{phaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sg_id_from_agent = #{sgIdFromAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ee_bp = #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ee_user = #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ee_status = #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
sg_id = #{sgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ee_id = #{eeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
